msg.payload = msg.payload.trim()
return msg;

name: keep payload
wpa_supplicant.conf
template:
ctrl_interface=DIR=/var/run/wpa_supplicant GROUP=netdev
update_config=1
country=DE

network={
        ssid="{{payload.ssid}}"
        psk="{{payload.pw}}"
}

name: dhcpcd.conf
template:
# A sample configuration for dhcpcd.
# See dhcpcd.conf(5) for details.

# Allow users of this group to interact with dhcpcd via the control socket.
#controlgroup wheel

# Inform the DHCP server of our hostname for DDNS.
hostname

# Use the hardware address of the interface for the Client ID.
clientid
# or
# Use the same DUID + IAID as set in DHCPv6 for DHCPv4 ClientID as per RFC4361.
# Some non-RFC compliant DHCP servers do not reply with this set.
# In this case, comment out duid and enable clientid above.
#duid

# Persist interface configuration when dhcpcd exits.
persistent

# Rapid commit support.
# Safe to enable by default because it requires the equivalent option set
# on the server to actually work.
option rapid_commit

# A list of options to request from the DHCP server.
option domain_name_servers, domain_name, domain_search, host_name
option classless_static_routes
# Respect the network MTU. This is applied to DHCP routes.
option interface_mtu

# Most distributions have NTP support.
#option ntp_servers

# A ServerID is required by RFC2131.
require dhcp_server_identifier

# Generate SLAAC address using the Hardware Address of the interface
#slaac hwaddr
# OR generate Stable Private IPv6 Addresses based from the DUID
slaac private

# Example static IP configuration:
#interface eth0
#static ip_address=192.168.0.10/24
#static ip6_address=fd51:42f8:caae:d92e::ff/64
#static routers=192.168.0.1
#static domain_name_servers=192.168.0.1 8.8.8.8 fd51:42f8:caae:d92e::1

# It is possible to fall back to a static IP if DHCP fails:
# define static profile
#profile static_eth0
#static ip_address=192.168.1.23/24
#static routers=192.168.1.1
#static domain_name_servers=192.168.1.1

# fallback to static profile on eth0
#interface eth0
#fallback static_eth0

name: !!!! You need to solve installation of the reed sensor!!!!
clean up
connectWifi - go back to AP mode if something went wrong
generate random id

func:
// NPM module exposed as variable, npm_module
return npm_module(msg.payload);

msg.payload = msg.payload == msg.response
return msg;

msg.topic = "tgActivationKey:"+msg.payload
return msg;

url = global.get("config.tg_activation_fun") 
key = msg.payload.activation_key
ip = msg.payload.current_local_ip
port = global.get("config.port")

msg.url = url + "?activationKey=" + key + "&localIP=" + ip+ "&port=" +port


return msg;

name: Store Telegram activation keys with expiration

func:
msg.payload = "mosquitto_sub" +
    " -h "+ msg.payload.server +
    " -p "+ msg.payload.port +
    " -u "+ msg.payload.username +
    " -P "+ msg.payload.password +
    " -i "+ msg.payload.clientId + "_sub" +
    " -t "+ msg.payload.topic + "/#" +
    " -v "
    
return msg;

msg.payload = "mosquitto_pub" +
    " -h "+ msg.payload.server +
    " -p "+ msg.payload.port +
    " -u "+ msg.payload.username +
    " -P "+ msg.payload.password +
    " -i "+ msg.payload.clientId +
    " -t "+ msg.payload.topic + "/" + msg.mqtt_topic +
    " -m "+ JSON.stringify(msg.tosend).
        replace(/\"/g, '\\"');
return msg;

name: format output

func: return msg;

template:
SELECT directiontype as label_type, direction, COUNT(id) FROM (

SELECT 
CASE 
	WHEN doc->'direction' ? 'set' THEN 'set'
	WHEN doc->'direction' ? 'predicted' THEN 'predicted'
	ELSE 'simple'
END AS directiontype,

CASE 
	WHEN doc->'direction' ? 'set' THEN doc->'direction'->>'set'
	WHEN doc->'direction' ? 'predicted' THEN doc->'direction'->>'predicted'
	ELSE 'undefined'
END AS direction

, id 

FROM PUBLIC.passage 
WHERE (doc->'direction' ? 'set' OR (doc->'direction' ? 'predicted' AND (doc->'direction'->>'score')::FLOAT8 > $thres ))
AND (doc->>'start')::FLOAT8 >= $from

) foo

GROUP BY directiontype, direction

ORDER BY directiontype, direction

func:
msg.payload = "/home/pi/.local/bin/patpred update "+
" -i /tmp/patpred/model_input.json" + 
" -t " + global.get("config").smart_passage.new.model +
" -r " + global.get("config").smart_passage.new.report
return msg;

template:
SELECT
CASE 
	WHEN doc->'direction' ? 'set' THEN 'set'
	WHEN doc->'direction' ? 'predicted' THEN 'predicted'
	ELSE 'simple'
END AS directiontype,

CASE 
	WHEN doc->'direction' ? 'set' THEN doc->'direction'->>'set'
	WHEN doc->'direction' ? 'predicted' THEN doc->'direction'->>'predicted'
	ELSE 'undefined'
END AS direction

, doc

, id 

FROM PUBLIC.passage 
WHERE (doc->'direction' ? 'set' 
OR ({{payload.useAutoScoredSql}} 
    AND doc->'direction' ? 'predicted' 
    AND (doc->'direction'->>'score')::FLOAT8 > $thres ))
AND (doc->>'start')::FLOAT8 >= $from

func:
msg.payload ={
    "dataFrom": msg.payload.dataFrom.length > 0 ? 
        parseInt(msg.payload.dataFrom) :
        0,
    "useAutoScored": msg.payload.useAutoScored === "true", 
    "autoRecalibrate": msg.payload.autoRecalibrate === "true",
    "autoReplace": msg.payload.autoReplace,
    "autoScoredThres": parseFloat(msg.payload.autoScoredThres)
}

msg.payload.useAutoScoredSql = 
    msg.payload.useAutoScored ?
    " true " : " false "

return msg;

msg.payload = 
"mv " + global.get("config").smart_passage.new.model +
" " + global.get("config").smart_passage.current.model
return msg;

msg.payload = 
"mv " + global.get("config").smart_passage.new.report +
" " + global.get("config").smart_passage.current.report
return msg;

msg.payload = 
"/home/pi/.local/bin/patpred score " +
" -m " + global.get("config").smart_passage.current.model +
" -d " + msg.payload

return msg;

msg.url = global.get("config.tg_notify_fun")
msg.payload = {
    localIP: msg.payload,
    localPort: global.get("config.port"),
    messageType: "passageNotification",
    chatId: msg.user.doc.chatId,
    tgKey: msg.user.doc.tgKey,
    direction: msg.passage[0].doc.direction.predicted ?
        msg.passage[0].doc.direction.predicted :
        msg.passage[0].doc.direction.simple,
    pattern: msg.passage[0].doc,
    passageId: msg.passage[0].id,
    ts: msg.passage.start,
    system: msg.system_uid,
}
return msg;

// NPM module exposed as variable, npm_module
return npm_module(msg.payload);
